biography.bio: Richard Münch was born on January 10, 1916 in Giessen, Germany. He was an actor, known for Patton (1970), The Longest Day (1962) and Le train (1964). He was married to Ella Büchi. He died on June 6, 1987 in Malaga, Spain.
biography.name: Richard Münch

biography.bio: Hans Leibelt was born on March 11, 1885 in Leipzig, Germany as Hans August Hermann Leibelt. He was an actor, known for Ce diable de garçon (1944), Vater sein dagegen sehr (1957) and Fais ta valise Sherlock Holmes (1960). He was married to Jenny Orf. He died on December 3, 1974 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Hans Leibelt

biography.bio: She started her long term acting career in 1904 as a young woman at the Deutsches Schauspielhaus in Hamburg. She was a member of stage companies in Hannover and Berlin, but she retired after her marriage in 1915. Her husband died in 1937 so she started again as a stage actress in Berlin. In 1939, she made her film debut. In the 40's, she also worked as a teacher at the drama school of the Deutsches Theater in Berlin. In the post war period, she was member of a popular radio cabaret group in Berlin. When she was older, she gained more popularity. In the 1960s, when she was in her seventies, she became a famous character actress of West German cinema and television. She played mostly old ladies with charm and wit. She is best remembered as grandma in the TV-series 'Die Unverbesserlichen' (1966-71). She died aged 87 in Berlin. Her grave is named a grave of honor.
biography.name: Agnes Windeck

biography.bio: Herbert Grünbaum was born on August 27, 1902 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Don Gil von den grünen Hosen (1964), The 3 Penny Opera (1931) and Der amerikanische Traum (1962). He died on September 23, 1981 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Herbert Grünbaum

biography.bio: Walter Tarrach was born on September 15, 1908 in Königsberg, East-Prussia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Heart of Stone (1950), Mylord weiß sich zu helfen (1958) and Deadly Decision (1954). He died on February 1, 1965 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Tarrach

biography.bio: Carla Hagen was born on September 11, 1931 in Hamburg, Germany as Carla-Maria Hagen. She is an actress, known for Le plongeon de Véra (1999), Die Frau des Fotografen oder Die große Liebe (1967) and Hôtel du commerce (1969).
biography.name: Carla Hagen

biography.bio: Else Knott was born on December 7, 1909 in Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany. She was an actress, known for Der Datterich (1963), Condemned to Sin (1964) and Familie Hesselbach im Urlaub (1955). She died on August 10, 1975 in Frankfurt am Main.
biography.name: Else Knott

biography.bio: Blandine Ebinger was born on November 4, 1899 in Berlin, Germany as Blandine Loeser. She was an actress, known for Jeunes filles en uniforme (1958), The Mysteries of a Hairdresser's Shop (1923) and Le menteur (1961). She was married to Hassenpflug, Helwig and Friedrich Hollaender. She died on December 25, 1993 in Berlin.
biography.name: Blandine Ebinger

biography.bio: Franz Weber was born on March 24, 1888 in Haspe, Germany. He was an actor, known for Spell of the Looking Glass (1932), Intermezzo (1936) and Das Mädchen von St. Coeur (1940). He died on August 10, 1962 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Franz Weber

biography.bio: Rudi Stöhr is an actor, known for Der König ist tot (1959), Adventure in Berlin (1952) and Sleeping Beauty (1955).
biography.name: Rudi Stöhr

biography.bio: Claus Landsittel is a director and writer, known for Löwenzahn (1981), Labskaus und Schampanjer (1991) and Herzklabastern (1995).
biography.name: Claus Landsittel

biography.bio: Dorothea Sudermann is an actress, known for Dr. Knock (1960), Jons und Erdme (1959) and Zwei alte Damen feuern (1960).
biography.name: Dorothea Sudermann

biography.bio: Stefan Wigger was born on March 26, 1932 in Leipzig, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ein Haus in der Toskana (1990), Die beiden Freundinnen (1978) and Hokuspokus oder: Wie lasse ich meinen Mann verschwinden...? (1966). He was married to Katrin Kazubko, Renate Reiche and Uta Hallant. He died on February 13, 2013 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Stefan Wigger

biography.bio: Henning Schlüter was born on March 1, 1927 in Hamburg, Germany as Henning Behrend Schlüter. He was an actor, known for Ein heikler Fall (1986), The Old Fox (1977) and One, Two, Three (1961). He died on July 20, 2000 in Hamburg.
biography.name: Henning Schlüter
